module: Module-level comment: The "mult_test" module performs arithmetic operations (multiplication and addition) and comparisons on 32-bit inputs (x0, xp0, x1, xp1) using parameterized instances (`qmult`, `qadd`, `fplessthan`, `fpgreaterthan`). It outputs results of these operations via ports (mult, add2, lt4, add1check) and uses internal signals (ltres, gtres, gt1, lt3, add1) to manage intermediate values for additional condition checking. This module supports configurable precision and size, suitable for numerical processing with integrated result validation.
